item.title: Getting Started with Argo Events
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Earlier, we introduced how to install and trigger tasks in Argo Workflow. This article mainly introduces a new tool: What is ArgoEvents? Argo Events is an event-driven Kubernetes workflow automation framework. It supports more than 20 different events (such as webhooks, S3 drops, cronjobs, message queues - such as Kafka, GCP PubSub, SNS, SQS, etc.) Features: Supports events from 20+ event sources and more than 10 triggers.
